docs.text: when i arrived in paris in june , 1992 , i was surprised to find france plastered with posters twin peaks : fire walk with me , since the movie wasn't scheduled to open in the u . s . until late august .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: happily , the film--the prequel to david lynch's cult television series--was playing in a fancy , thx theater .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: unfortunately , the theater was far more impressive than the movie , which absolutely stinks , much like a french lavatory .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: worse , actually .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: fire walk with me ( directed by lynch ) will be completely incomprehensible to anyone who has not seen the tv series or read " laura palmer's secret diary . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: for " twin peaks " junkies , like me , the movie is only marginally improved .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the plot is jumbled and illogical , not to mention excruciatingly sluggish .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the first 30 minutes , which have almost nothing to do with the main story line , feature chris isaak and kiefer sutherland as fbi agents investigating a murder in portland , oregon .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the movie then stops in philadelphia for a nonsensical cameo by david bowie and a brief appearance by kyle maclachlan as dale cooper .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: lynch then drops this plot strand altogether and abruptly shifts the setting to twin peaks , washington--one year later .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: ah , twin peaks : " familiar territory , " you think to yourself as angelo badalamenti's distinctive musical score chimes in .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: wrong !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the movie proves that you really can't go home again , or at least lynch can't .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: only about a quarter of the characters from the tv series appear in the movie : leland palmer , bobby briggs , james , shelly , leo , the log lady and a few others--mostly in meaningless cameos .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the rest of the " twin peaks " cast is nowhere to be seen , and consequently , lynch fails to recreate the spirit and flavor of tv's most enigmatic town .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: cast members michael ontkean , sherilyn fenn , piper laurie , and richard beymer are sorely missed , not to mention lara flynn boyle , who has been replaced by lackluster moira kelly in the crucial role of donna .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the movie concentrates solely on laura palmer ( sheryl lee ) as she suffers through drug abuse , prostitution , and incest , during her miserable last seven days on earth .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the night of laura's death , which is truly terrifying , is the film's only remotely effective sequence .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: we finally get to see exactly what happened to laura after she jumped off james' motorcycle and ran into the woods at that lonely traffic light in the middle of nowhere .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: her murder unfolds just as agent cooper reconstructed it in the tv series , which is gratifying for faithful " twin peaks " viewers .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but it's an awfully small reward for sitting through a painfully awful movie .
docs.label: negative
